text: avane, mantapaviruva (uda: Draksi) hagu mantapavillada totagalannu, kharjuravannu, vividha bageya belegalannu mattu samarupigalagiyu, bhinna rupigalagiyu iruva jhaitun (ippe) hagu dalimbegalannu srstisidavanu. Avu phala nididaga avugala phalavannu tinniri mattu avugala bele koyyuva dina avugala badhyateyannu (usr athava hattane ondansa danavannu) pavatisiri. Apavyaya madabedi. Apavyaya maduvavarannu avanu (allahanu) khandita meccuvudilla
